Package: grails.test.runtime

[Groovy] Class DomainClassTestPlugin

    • grails.test.runtime.DomainClassTestPlugin
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      TestPlugin

      @groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class DomainClassTestPlugin

      a TestPlugin for TestRuntime for adding Grails DomainClass (GORM) support - this implementation uses SimpleMapDatastore GORM implementation

      Authors:
      Lari Hotari
      Since:
      2.4.0
